Hi Kotliner!

I have two questions for you:

How many coroutine mistakes have you seen?

And a follow-up: how many have you actually fixed?

I’ve encountered far too many common coroutine mistakes — even among experienced developers. These issues often lead to subtle bugs and unpredictable behavior.

That’s why I’m hosting a free live webinar:

Mistakes You’re Making Using Kotlin Coroutines

This session is for anyone who wants to write safer, more predictable coroutine code. We’ll explore:

  • How to properly start synchronous and asynchronous processes
  • Effective use of dispatchers
  • Avoiding common cancellation pitfalls
  • How not to break structured concurrency.

My goal is to give you actionable insights you can apply immediately.

Pick the slot that suits you:

  • 1:00pm CEST — convenient for Asia & Europe work hours
  • 6:00pm CEST — Americas-friendly, EU-evening

Seats are limited to ensure a smooth Q&A — secure yours today.

See you in the webinar!

Best,

Marcin Moskała
